query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS edc_chemicals (
    id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
    cas_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    chemical_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    common_names JSON,
    chemical_class VARCHAR(100),
    edc_category VARCHAR(100),
    hormone_systems_affected JSON,
    health_effects TEXT,
    common_sources JSON,
    exposure_routes JSON,
    bioaccumulation_potential VARCHAR(50),
    regulatory_status TEXT,
    epa_data JSON,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
